options.text: Clockwise moment is twice as large as anti-clockwise moment

options.label: b
options.text: Clockwise moment is three times as large as anti-clockwise moment

options.label: c
options.text: Clockwise moment is half as large as anti-clockwise moment

options.label: d
options.text: Clockwise moment is exactly equal in magnitude to the anti-clockwise moment

The speed of ultrasound in metal is 5,000 m/s. How far away is a crack in the metal if an ultrasound wave is sent through the metal and is reflected back from the crack to the detector in 0.01 ms?
Which of the following is/are advantages of ultrasound used in medical scanning?

options.label: a
options.text: Non invasive - it is all done from the outside of the body

options.label: b
options.text: Inexpensive compared to other scanning methods

questions.question: Which of the following is/are disadvantages of ultrasound?

options.label: b
options.text: Reflected strongly when passing from tissue to gas

options.label: c
options.text: Does not pass well through bone

questions.question: Which of the following statements is correct?

options.label: a
options.text: Ultrasound waves are partially reflected when they are incident upon a boundary between two different mediums. The time it takes for the reflections to hit a detector can be used to determine the distance the boundary is from the detector

options.label: b
options.text: Ultrasound waves are fully reflected when they are incident upon a boundary between two different mediums. The time it takes for the reflections to hit a detector can be used to determine the distance the boundary is from the detector

options.label: c
options.text: Ultrasound waves are partially reflected when they are incident upon a boundary between two identical mediums. The time it takes for the reflections to hit a detector can be used to determine the distance the boundary is from the detector

options.label: d
options.text: Ultrasound waves are fully reflected when they are incident upon a boundary between two identical mediums. The time it takes for the reflections to hit a detector can be used to determine the distance the boundary is from the detector

questions.question: Which of the following are medical uses of ultrasound?

options.label: c
options.text: Neither of the above, X-rays are used
